text: a. The provisions of this subchapter shall apply to the acquisition by the city of real estate outside the city for the purposes of water supply. b. The provisions of section 5-329 of the code shall be construed to apply to this subchapter. c. Nothing in this subchapter contained shall be deemed to repeal the provisions of chapter nine hundred forty-two of the laws of eighteen hundred ninety-six except where said chapter may be inconsistent with the provisions of the eminent domain procedure law.
